TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataReceivedEventHandler(object sender, DataReceivedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataReceivedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataReceivedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataReceivedEventArgs)
public delegate void DataReceivedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataReceivedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 的 事件或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event or event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 若要以异步方式收集的重定向或进程的输出流中，添加到事件处理程序或事件。To asynchronously collect the redirected or stream output of a process, add your event handler to the or event. 进程会将行写入相应的重定向流每次会引发这些事件。These events are raised each time the process writes a line to the corresponding redirected stream. 当重定向的流已关闭时，null 行发送到事件处理程序。When the redirected stream is closed, a null line is sent to the event handler. 确保在访问前事件处理程序检查此条件属性。Ensure that your event handler checks for this condition before accessing the property. 例如，你可以使用`static`方法验证事件处理程序中的属性。For example, you can use the `static` method to validate the property in your event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行上的重定向的异步读取的操作流**排序**命令。The following code example illustrates how to perform asynchronous read operations on the redirected stream of the **sort** command. **排序**命令是一个控制台应用程序，读取对文本输入进行排序。The **sort** command is a console application that reads and sorts text input. 该示例创建委托`SortOutputHandler`事件处理程序并将关联委托，它具有事件。The example creates a delegate for the `SortOutputHandler` event handler and associates the delegate with the event. 事件处理程序接收来自的重定向的文本行流，格式文本，并将文本写入屏幕。The event handler receives text lines from the redirected stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen. [!code-cpp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CPP/sort_async.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CS/sort_async.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/VB/sort_async.vb#1)]
